response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value and relevance to you, as it is worth $1,500,000 to you personally. I understand its importance and am eager to facilitate this transaction in a manner that benefits both parties.

To make this acquisition possible, I am offering you the chance to purchase the product at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This represents a strategic advantage, allowing you to secure the item at a reduced cost compared to its perceived value. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be making a wise investment that aligns with your interests and needs.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions or provide further details to ensure a smooth and satisfactory transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1400000}
